string-array.name: Codex_Story
string-array.item: And created Watabou Pixel Dungeon. And he looked at his handiwork. And he saw that it was good!
Bounce Glyph - Causes enemies to be pushed back after hitting the Hero.
Affection Glyph - The enemy will be charmed for few turns, while the Hero will be charmed few turns too but never more than the enemy.
Anti-entropy Glyph - The Hero will be illuminated and catch fire, and the enemy will be frozen.
Multiplicity Glyph - This effect causes the Hero to spawn a mirror image but be damaged. This can kill the Hero.
Potential Glyph - This unleashes a lightning-style blast that will damage the enemy which attacked the player and will damage the Hero on average half the damage done to the enemy.
Metabolism Glyph - The Hero will be partially healed from, before the enemy damage is applied. Only applies if the Hero is not starving. The Hero hunger will also grow faster.
Stench Glyph - The Hero will release a cloud of toxic gas when hit.
Viscosity Glyph - The hero will obtain the damage deferred debuff, which will cause the Hero to receive 1 damage per turn, instead of receiving the whole amount in one shot.
Displacement Glyph - Whenever the Hero is hit, there is a chance that the Hero will be teleported to a random visible tile. This glyph does not work on boss levels.
Entanglement Glyph - The hero may receive herbal armor, but to also be rooted at the same time.
Grim weapon - On successful hit, can instantly kill the target (or deal up to 2x damage to a boss).
Blazing weapon - On successful hit, deal extra damage to target and can burn it.
Eldritch weapon - On successful hit, enemy can flee in Terror.
Unstable weapon - On successful hit, can apply the effect of any random enchantment.
Vampiric weapon - On successful hit, can heal the Hero for part of damage dealt to the enemy.
Lucky weapon - almost completely ignores enemy weapon, and do much more damage.
Stunning weapon - On successful hit, can paralyze target.
Piercing weapon - On successful hit, can damage all enemies in a straight line behind the target.
Venomous weapon - On successful hit, can poison target.
Chilling weapon - On successful hit, can slow target and will prevent it from burning.
Wild weapon - On successful hit, can damage all enemies adjacent to the target.
